parties.raw_snippet: THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES (this “Agreement”) between Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust (“Client”) and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner Services), a New Jersey limited liability company (“Agent”), is dated as of January 26, 2011.
parties.reasoning: The opening paragraph of the Agreement explicitly names the two contracting entities and labels their roles (Client and Agent). This is the clearest identification of the parties.
normalized_value: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund

contract_type.raw_snippet: Client appoints Agent as its transfer agent, registrar and dividend disbursing agent and Agent accepts such appointment in accordance with and subject to the following terms and conditions for all authorized shares of each class of stock listed in Exhibit A hereto (the “Shares”).
contract_type.reasoning: The core obligations are that the Agent will act as transfer agent, registrar and dividend disbursing agent and provide the services listed in the exhibits. This shows the agreement is for provision of services (transfer-agent/registrar/disbursing services), i.e., a Service Agreement.

notice_period.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
notice_period.reasoning: This sentence in Section 2 specifies the advance written notice required to prevent automatic renewal of the contract: at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term or any successive three-year term.

expiration_date.raw_snippet: Agent’s appointment hereunder shall commence on the next business day after the later of (i) the date hereof, or (ii) the date Agent has confirmed that Client’s records have been converted to Agent’s system (the “Effective Date”), and shall continue for three years thereafter (the “Initial Term”).
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 2 defines the term as continuing for three years after the Effective Date (the Initial Term). This is a relative term (three years from the Effective Date), not a specific calendar date.
expiration_date.normalized_value: three years from the Effective Date

renewal_term.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms;
renewal_term.reasoning: The same Section 2 language states that the Agreement "shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms," indicating the renewal period and that renewal is automatic unless timely notice is given.
